original: @67b # // rgya gar skad du /🔽ni ru pa ma sta bam /
analyzed: @67b # // rgya gar skad du / ni ru pa ma sta bam /
translated: In Sanskrit:🔽Nirupama-stotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpe med par bstod pa /
analyzed: dpe med par bstod pa /
translated: Praise Without Example

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽gang zhig lta bas phongs pa yi //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo // gang zhig lta bas phongs pa yi //
translated: Homage to youthful Manjushri!

original: 'jig rten 'di la phan brtson khyod //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di la phan brtson khyod //
translated: You strive to benefit this world,🔽which is impoverished by wrong views.

original: dngos po med pa'i don rig pas //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i don rig pas //
translated: You know the meaning of non-entityness.

original: dpe med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: dpe med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage to you, O peerless one!

original: gang zhig khyod kyis cung zhig kyang //
analyzed: gang zhig khyod kyis cung zhig kyang //
translated: There is nothing whatsoever

original: sangs rgyas spyan gyis ma gzigs pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas spyan gyis ma gzigs pa //
translated: that is not seen by the Buddha's eye.

original: khyod kyis gzigs pa bla med de //
analyzed: khyod kyis gzigs pa bla med de //
translated: Your vision is unsurpassed.

original: de nyid don ni rig pa lags ;
analyzed: de nyid don ni rig pa lags ;
translated: You know the meaning of reality.

original: / don dam pa yi yod pa nyid //
analyzed: / don dam pa yi yod pa nyid //
translated: The ultimate existence

original: rtogs dang rtogs bya mi mnga' zhing //🔽ae ma'o mchog tu rtogs dka' ba'i //
analyzed: rtogs dang rtogs bya mi mnga' zhing // ae ma'o mchog tu rtogs dka' ba'i //
translated: is not realized by the realizer.🔽Ah! The nature of reality,

original: chos nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtogs //
analyzed: chos nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtogs //
translated: which is most difficult to realize, is realized by the buddhas.

original: khyod kyis cung zhig ma bskyed cing //
analyzed: khyod kyis cung zhig ma bskyed cing //
translated: You have not created anything

original: chos rnams bkag pa'ang ma lags la //
analyzed: chos rnams bkag pa'ang ma lags la //
translated: and you have not stopped phenomena.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi lta ba yis //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi lta ba yis //
translated: Through the view of equality,

original: bla na med pa'i go 'phang brnyes //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i go 'phang brnyes //
translated: you have attained the unsurpassed stage.

original: 'khor ba spangs par gyur pa yis //
analyzed: 'khor ba spangs par gyur pa yis //
translated: You do not seek nirvana,

original: mya ngan 'das khyod mi bzhed kyi //🔽'khor ba ma dmigs pa nyid kyi //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das khyod mi bzhed kyi // 'khor ba ma dmigs pa nyid kyi //
translated: Because you have abandoned samsara.🔽You, Protector, have realized

original: zhi de mgon po khyod kyis rtogs //
analyzed: zhi de mgon po khyod kyis rtogs //
translated: That peace is the non-apprehension of samsara.🔽You, who know that the afflicted

original: khyod kyis kun nas nyon mongs dang // rnam byang ro gcig gyur rig pas //🔽chos dbyings mngon par dbyer med pa //
analyzed: khyod kyis kun nas nyon mongs dang // rnam byang ro gcig gyur rig pas // chos dbyings mngon par dbyer med pa //
translated: And the purified are of one taste,🔽Have realized the inseparability

original: kun du rnam par dag par gyur //🔽gtso bo khyod kyis 'ga' zhig tu //
analyzed: kun du rnam par dag par gyur // gtso bo khyod kyis 'ga' zhig tu //
translated: Of the dharmadhatu, and are completely pure.🔽O Chief, you have not uttered

original: yi ge gcig kyang ma gsungs la //
analyzed: yi ge gcig kyang ma gsungs la //
translated: Even a single syllable,

original: gdul bya'i 'gro ba ma lus pa //
analyzed: gdul bya'i 'gro ba ma lus pa //
translated: Yet all beings to be trained

original: chos kyi char gyis tshim par mdzad //
analyzed: chos kyi char gyis tshim par mdzad //
translated: Are satisfied by the rain of Dharma.

original: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' khyod //
analyzed: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' khyod //
translated: You, who have a mind equal to space,🔽Are not attached

original: phung po khams dang skye mched la //🔽chags par gyur @68a * //🔽pa mi mnga' bas //
analyzed: phung po khams dang skye mched la // chags par gyur @68a * // pa mi mnga' bas //
translated: To the aggregates, elements, and sense-spheres.

original: chos rnams kun la brten ma lags //🔽mgon khyod sems can 'du shes kyis //
analyzed: chos rnams kun la brten ma lags // mgon khyod sems can 'du shes kyis //
translated: You do not rely on any phenomena.🔽O Protector, you do not engage

original: 'jug pa kun du mi mnga' yang //
analyzed: 'jug pa kun du mi mnga' yang //
translated: In any way through the perception of sentient beings,🔽Yet you are compassionate

original: sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sems can la //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sems can la //
translated: Toward sentient beings who suffer.

original: snying rje'i bdag nyid gyur pa'ang khyod //
analyzed: snying rje'i bdag nyid gyur pa'ang khyod //
translated: You are the embodiment of compassion.

original: bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin du //
analyzed: bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin du //
translated: You are the master of happiness and suffering,

original: rtag mi rtag sogs la gtso khyod //🔽de lta'i rnam rtog sna tshogs kyis //
analyzed: rtag mi rtag sogs la gtso khyod // de lta'i rnam rtog sna tshogs kyis //
translated: Permanence and impermanence, and so forth.

original: thugs ni chags par gyur ma lags //
analyzed: thugs ni chags par gyur ma lags //
translated: Your mind is not attached🔽To the various thoughts🔽Such as “I am” and “I am not.”

original: chos rnams gang du 'ang 'gro 'ong med //
analyzed: chos rnams gang du 'ang 'gro 'ong med //
translated: Dharmas do not come or go anywhere,

original: de bzhin khyod kyis gshegs pa'ang lags //
analyzed: de bzhin khyod kyis gshegs pa'ang lags //
translated: And you have gone in that way.

original: 'ga' ru spungs pa ma mchis pa //
analyzed: 'ga' ru spungs pa ma mchis pa //
translated: They are not heaped up anywhere,

original: de phyir don dam rig pa'ang lags //
analyzed: de phyir don dam rig pa'ang lags //
translated: And so you are the knower of the ultimate.

original: kun gyi rjes su zhugs gyur kyang //
analyzed: kun gyi rjes su zhugs gyur kyang //
translated: You have entered into everything,

original: 'ga' ru 'byung ba'ang ma lags la //
analyzed: 'ga' ru 'byung ba'ang ma lags la //
translated: But you do not arise anywhere.

original: skye dang chos dang sku rnams kyang //
analyzed: skye dang chos dang sku rnams kyang //
translated: The birth, dharmas, and body

original: thub chen khyod kyi bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: thub chen khyod kyi bsam mi khyab //
translated: Of the Great Sage are inconceivable.

original: gcig dang gzhan pa rnams spangs pa //
analyzed: gcig dang gzhan pa rnams spangs pa //
translated: You have abandoned being the same or different,

original: brag ca lta bu'i 'gro ba rnams //
analyzed: brag ca lta bu'i 'gro ba rnams //
translated: And you have realized that beings are like echoes.

original: 'pho dang 'jig pa rnam spangs pa //
analyzed: 'pho dang 'jig pa rnam spangs pa //
translated: You have abandoned transition and destruction,

original: smad pa med pa khyod kyis rtogs //
analyzed: smad pa med pa khyod kyis rtogs //
translated: And you have realized that there is nothing to be disparaged.

original: rtag dang chad pa dang bral zhing //
analyzed: rtag dang chad pa dang bral zhing //
translated: You are free from permanence and annihilation,

original: mtshan nyid mtshon bya rnam spangs par //
analyzed: mtshan nyid mtshon bya rnam spangs par //
translated: And you have abandoned characteristics and what is characterized.

original: gtso bos rmi lam sgyu tshogs bzhin //
analyzed: gtso bos rmi lam sgyu tshogs bzhin //
translated: The chief one is like a dream or a magical display.🔽

original: 'khor ba nges par rtogs pa lags //🔽bag chags gzhir gyur mthar thug pa'i //
analyzed: 'khor ba nges par rtogs pa lags // bag chags gzhir gyur mthar thug pa'i //
translated: The chief one realizes that cyclic existence is like a dream or a magical illusion.

original: khyod kyis nyon mongs sdig pa spangs //
analyzed: khyod kyis nyon mongs sdig pa spangs //
translated: You have abandoned the afflictions and misdeeds,🔽which are the basis of habitual tendencies and the ultimate.🔽You have also accomplished the ambrosia

original: nyon mongs nyid kyi rang bzhin yang //🔽khyod kyis bdud rtsi nyid du bsgrubs //🔽dpa' bo khyod kyis gzugs rnams kyis //
analyzed: nyon mongs nyid kyi rang bzhin yang // khyod kyis bdud rtsi nyid du bsgrubs // dpa' bo khyod kyis gzugs rnams kyis //
translated: of the very nature of the afflictions.🔽O hero, you see forms

original: mtshan ma med mthong gzugs med bzhin //
analyzed: mtshan ma med mthong gzugs med bzhin //
translated: as if they were formless.

original: mtshan gyis 'bar ba'i sku nyid kyang //
analyzed: mtshan gyis 'bar ba'i sku nyid kyang //
translated: Although your body blazes with the major marks,

original: gzugs su spyod yul nyid du mthong //
analyzed: gzugs su spyod yul nyid du mthong //
translated: it is seen as an object of form.

original: gzugs su mthong bas mthong min yang //
analyzed: gzugs su mthong bas mthong min yang //
translated: Although it is not seen by seeing form,

original: mthong ngo zhes ni rjod par byed //
analyzed: mthong ngo zhes ni rjod par byed //
translated: it is said to be seen.

original: chos mthong bas ni shin tu mthong //
analyzed: chos mthong bas ni shin tu mthong //
translated: It is seen very well by seeing the Dharma,

original: chos nyid mthong ba ma yin no //
analyzed: chos nyid mthong ba ma yin no //
translated: but not by seeing reality.

original: khong stong khyod kyi sku la med //
analyzed: khong stong khyod kyi sku la med //
translated: Your body is not hollow inside,

original: sha dang rus pa khrag med kyang //
analyzed: sha dang rus pa khrag med kyang //
translated: but it is without flesh, bones, and blood.🔽Your body is shown to be

original: nam mkha'i dbang po'i gzhu bzhin du //🔽khyod kyi sku ni ston par mdzad //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbang po'i gzhu bzhin du // khyod kyi sku ni ston par mdzad //
translated: like the bow of the lord of the sky.

original: sku la bsnyun med mi gtsang med //
analyzed: sku la bsnyun med mi gtsang med //
translated: Your body is without illness and without impurity.

original: bkres dang skom pa 'byung med kyang //🔽khyod ni 'jig rten rjes 'jug phyir //
analyzed: bkres dang skom pa 'byung med kyang // khyod ni 'jig rten rjes 'jug phyir //
translated: And you do not experience hunger or thirst.🔽But you follow the world,

original: 'jig rten spyod pa'ang ston par mdzad //
analyzed: 'jig rten spyod pa'ang ston par mdzad //
translated: And so you show yourself to be engaged in worldly conduct.

original: las kyi sgrib pa'i skyon rnams ni //
analyzed: las kyi sgrib pa'i skyon rnams ni //
translated: You are free of all the faults of karmic obscuration,

original: sdig med khyod kyis kun spangs kyang //
analyzed: sdig med khyod kyis kun spangs kyang //
translated: And you are free of any negativity.

original: khyod kyis sems can rjes gzung phyir //
analyzed: khyod kyis sems can rjes gzung phyir //
translated: But in order to care for sentient beings,

original: las spangs par yang rab tu bstan //
analyzed: las spangs par yang rab tu bstan //
translated: You have also taught the abandonment of karma.

original: chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir //
translated: Since there is no division in the dharmadhātu,

original: gtso bo theg @68b dbyer ma mchis kyang //
analyzed: gtso bo theg @68b dbyer ma mchis kyang //
translated: There is no division in the vehicle, O Chief.

original: khyod kyi theg pa gsum bstan pa //
analyzed: khyod kyi theg pa gsum bstan pa //
translated: But you have taught three vehicles

original: sems can gzhug pa'i ched du lags //🔽rtag cing brten la zhi ba yi //
analyzed: sems can gzhug pa'i ched du lags // rtag cing brten la zhi ba yi //
translated: In order to guide sentient beings.🔽Your body is the nature of phenomena,

original: chos kyi rang bzhin khyod kyi sku //
analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin khyod kyi sku //
translated: Which is permanent, stable, and peaceful.

original: rgyal bas gdul bya 'gro ba'i phyir //
analyzed: rgyal bas gdul bya 'gro ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to guide those to be trained,

original: khyod nyid mya ngan 'das par bstan //
analyzed: khyod nyid mya ngan 'das par bstan //
translated: You, O Victorious One, have shown yourself to be in nirvāṇa.

original: grangs med 'jig rten khams rnams su //🔽'das dang bltams dang mngon byang chub //
analyzed: grangs med 'jig rten khams rnams su // 'das dang bltams dang mngon byang chub //
translated: In countless world systems,🔽You have demonstrated passing into parinirvāṇa,

original: 'khor ba'ang thar par mos rnams kyi //
analyzed: 'khor ba'ang thar par mos rnams kyi //
translated: Being born, and attaining manifest enlightenment.🔽In cyclic existence, you have also demonstrated

original: khyod la gus rnams kyis yang mthong //🔽mgon po sems pa mi mnga' zhing //
analyzed: khyod la gus rnams kyis yang mthong // mgon po sems pa mi mnga' zhing //
translated: And those who revere you will see you again.🔽Lord, you have no thoughts,

original: rnam rtog g-ye ba mi mnga' yang //🔽khyod nyid dang gis 'jig rten la //
analyzed: rnam rtog g-ye ba mi mnga' yang // khyod nyid dang gis 'jig rten la //
translated: And no distraction of conceptualization,🔽Yet you naturally engage in the deeds of a buddha

original: sangs rgyas mdzad pa'ang 'jug par 'gyur //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mdzad pa'ang 'jug par 'gyur //
translated: For the world, without any effort.

original: de ltar bde gshegs yon tan tshad med bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: de ltar bde gshegs yon tan tshad med bsam mi khyab //
translated: Thus, the Sugata’s qualities are immeasurable and inconceivable.🔽Whatever merit I have gained

original: me tog gis brgyan pa las bsod nams gang thob par //
analyzed: me tog gis brgyan pa las bsod nams gang thob par //
translated: By adorning this with flowers,🔽May all these sentient beings🔽Become vessels for the Dharma of the supreme Sage.

original: gyur pa 'di ni sems can ma lus pa 'di dag / mchog tu rtogs dka' thub pa'i chos kyi snod gyur cig / dpe med par bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: gyur pa 'di ni sems can ma lus pa 'di dag / mchog tu rtogs dka' thub pa'i chos kyi snod gyur cig / dpe med par bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The praise without peer composed by Ācārya Ārya Nāgārjuna is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po krishna pandi ta dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po krishna pandi ta dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o//
translated: The Indian preceptor Kṛṣṇapandita and the translator-monk Tshültrim Gyalwa translated this.
